text:
@narendramodi @AmitShah
#Fulllockdown
The situation is going to be very dangerous in India amid Covid-19 that we can't expect. Complete combine lockdown in red & orange zone is required now. Green Zone can get relaxation. #LeaveEconomy
Otherwise,we lose many innocent life. @PMOIndia @AmitShah
